group_1.textLeft: It's a beautiful afternoon.
We've worked hard to clean the temple@and graves.
Since we're forbidden from returning to@the manor, we look for the magpie everyday…

group_1.textRight: I had a feeling this would be impossible,@but we really can't find it at all…
If Chika from the Tokime Clan were here,@with her power to talk to animals,
maybe we could have managed, but…

group_1.textLeft: …There's no point in longing for someone@who isn't here.

group_1.textRight: Sorry…

group_1.textLeft: No, I'm the one who should be apologizing…
In any case, Iroha's concept is still@being gathered,
which means history hasn't been@derailed yet…

group_1.textRight: So we still have a chance@to make things right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah…

group_1.textRight: I see it's difficult to find one little bird,@even for an almighty Battle Shamaness.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Mister Gen'un…
You need something?

group_1.textRight: Yes. We shall be preparing for war,@so things will be hectic from now on.
I appreciate your understanding.

group_1.textLeft: A war…?
Wait, the temple has to fight, too?!

group_1.textRight: I think it's best if I explain.

group_1.textLeft: But you didn't want her to get involved, Tsuyu.

group_1.textRight: I appreciate your kindness, but since I'm here,
I don't mind informing her.

group_1.textLeft: So what's going on…?

group_1.textRight: To keep things short, we've decided@to attack the Taito Gang directly.

group_1.textLeft: What…? Really?

group_1.textRight: It's true.
The Mizuna Clan has been investigating these dangerous Demon-wielding bandits,
and we were finally able to find a route@to the Taito Gang's village.
With this, the famine shall finally end.

group_1.textLeft: And the Suitoku has been involved in this since@the start, so they're also joining the battle…

group_1.textRight: And there's another reason for this battle.

group_1.textLeft: Besides ending the famine?

group_1.textRight: Yes, this will be a way of killing two birds@with one stone.
The Taito Gang have been killing and stealing@from others for hundreds of years.
The money and goods they've been plundering@all this time might be in their keep.
If we can recover these goods, we can make up@the money for the debt moratorium.

group_1.textLeft: But isn't that looting…?

group_1.textRight: We're simply taking back@what was stolen from us.
We'll keep it secret to minimize the danger.

group_1.textLeft: I see…
Well, since this problem involves the whole@country, how many people will be involved?

group_1.textRight: The Sumiya will be issuing orders,@while the Kumai will lead the forces.
The Sango, Nagitsu, and Kosho Clans will@also assist us in the assault.
It will be a massive strike, but it should all be@resolved within just a few moments.

group_1.textLeft: Will you be joining them, Princess?

group_1.textRight: The Battle Shamaness of the East…Chizuru…@will be among our foes.
I'm the only one who can stop her.
Have you finished explaining, Tsuyu?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I'll be on my way.

group_1.textRight: And…I'm sorry, too.
My father is still furious about what happened@with the magpie,
so you can't return to the mansion yet…

group_1.textLeft: Ah…yeah… Don't worry about it.
I have one question before you go, though.

group_1.textRight: What is it?

group_1.textLeft: What will you do if you see Chizuru again?

group_1.textRight: I don't want to kill her.

group_1.textLeft: You don't want to kill her…huh.
